# Introduction

An overview of the head of this data frame is shown in Table \@ref(tab:iris).

```{r iris, echo=FALSE}
kable(head(iris), caption = "Example of header.")
```

We can explore the tendencies by species using boxplots, as in Fig \@ref(fig:iris-box).

```{r iris-box, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="An example of boxplots."}
boxplot(Sepal.Length ~ Species, data = iris)
```
